title: [Dynamic Region] TiDB fails to start, "Internal error: received illegal TiKV response"
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

TiDB fails to start with TiKV multi rocksdb enabled.

### What version of TiKV are you using?
<!-- You can run `tikv-server --version` -->

nightly (2023-07-06)

### Steps to reproduce
<!-- If possible, provide a recipe for reproducing the error. A complete runnable program is good. -->

Enable multi rocksdb and run TiDB cluster.

### What did you expect?

TiDB can startup.

### What did happened?

TiDB panic.
